items.sentence: I thought that it was really nice of you to buy that for Tom.
Tom thought Mary probably didn't know that John spoke French.
Tom thinks that you're good at French, but I know you're not.
I'm assuming the gunshot I heard was the one that killed Tom.
I assume that it's clear to you now why we couldn't hire Tom.
Tom knew Mary told everyone she wasn't going to go to Boston.
Tom says he didn't know Mary couldn't speak French very well.
Tom said I should've stayed in Boston for another week or so.
Tom thinks that Mary doesn't know that John can speak French.
Tom said he thought Mary wasn't very good at speaking French.
